RumorFact.Text: The Nomai planned to relocate the solar panels on Ember Twin to a grassy plateau on Ember Twin's surface, directly above the Sunless City.
Chert suggests exploring the Hourglass Twins' poles first to be safe from the column of sand.
I found a Nomai recording near this site describing a second Quantum Moon Locator on Brittle Hollow.

ExploreFact.Text: A grassy plateau on Ember Twin's south pole that the Nomai scouted as a potential relocation site for something. They hoped that this relocation would allow them to no longer be deprived of energy by Ash Twin's shadow.

AltText.Text: A grassy plateau on Ember Twin's south pole that the Nomai scouted as a potential relocation site for the solar panels on Ember Twin, due to Ash Twin's shadow regularly depriving them of energy.

ExploreFact.Text: Sunless days happen during a solar eclipse.
Leaving a set of eyes on the planet's surface allows one to detect the presence of a sunless day while underground.
